snippet: Prosecutors filed felony charges Friday against two former Boy Scout leaders accused of toppling an ancient rock formation at Goblin Valley State Park. Glenn Taylor is charged with criminal mischief and David Hall with aiding criminal mischief.
abstract: Utah prosecutors file felony charges against former Boy Scout leaders Glenn Taylor and David Hall, who are accused of toppling an ancient rock formation at Goblin Valley State Park.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors filed felony charges Friday against two former Boy Scout leaders accused of toppling an ancient rock formation at Goblin Valley State Park. Glenn Taylor is charged with criminal mischief and David Hall with aiding criminal mischief.

headline.main: Utah: Ex-Scout Leaders Face Charges in Dislodging of Ancient Rock
headline.print_headline: Utah: Ex-Scout Leaders Face Charges in Dislodging of Ancient Rock
